title: The Importance of Integration
description:
As an international school student, Pun Pun has had the opportunity to develop diverse interests and is keen to explore the ways in which they can be integrated - both in the international and the local Thai school context.
When the education system encourages specialization and the world increasingly demanding interconnectedness, we must find a practical solution to integrate the disciplines with the resources we have.
author: Pun Pun Yongphiphatwong
